differentiators.title: Why Choose Aero Prosthetics

items.title: Cutting-Edge Technology
items.description: Pioneering 3D-printed prosthetics with biomechanical optimization for unmatched comfort and functionality

items.title: Personalized Care

items.description: Board-certified specialists with advanced credentials and decades of combined clinical experience

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Comprehensive prosthetic and orthotic solutions for all needs

technologyShowcase.title: Cutting-Edge Technology
technologyShowcase.description: Our premium prosthetic solutions incorporate the latest advancements in materials science, 3D printing, and microprocessor technology to deliver unparalleled comfort and performance.
features: Carbon fiber and titanium alloy components
Advanced microprocessor knee and ankle systems

serviceItems.title: Lower Limb Prosthetics
serviceItems.description: Custom-designed prosthetic solutions for below-knee, above-knee, and partial foot amputations.
serviceItems.details: Featuring microprocessor knees, energy-storing feet, and waterproof options.

serviceItems.title: Upper Limb Prosthetics
serviceItems.description: Advanced prosthetic options for hand, wrist, elbow, and shoulder amputations.
serviceItems.details: Including myoelectric hands, activity-specific terminal devices, and passive cosmetic options.

serviceItems.title: Pediatric Prosthetics
serviceItems.description: Specialized prosthetic solutions designed for children's unique needs and growth.
serviceItems.details: Adjustable components to accommodate growth, lightweight materials, and vibrant customization options.

serviceItems.title: Orthotics
serviceItems.description: Custom bracing solutions for spine, lower limb, and upper limb conditions.
serviceItems.details: Carbon fiber components, 3D-printed custom braces, and sport-specific orthoses.

serviceItems.title: Compression Garments
serviceItems.description: Medical-grade compression solutions for various conditions.
serviceItems.details: Custom-fitted garments with antimicrobial properties and moisture-wicking technology.

serviceItems.title: Mastectomy Products
serviceItems.description: Specialized breast forms and post-mastectomy products.
serviceItems.details: Silicone forms with temperature equalization, custom nipple prostheses, and post-surgical garments.

items.quote: The team at Aero Prosthetics changed my life. Their personalized approach and cutting-edge technology gave me back my mobility and confidence.

items.quote: After struggling with ill-fitting prosthetics for years, I finally found Aero Prosthetics. Their custom solutions and ongoing support have made all the difference.

items.name: David Martinez
items.quote: The pediatric team at Aero Prosthetics has been amazing with my son. They understand children's unique needs and have helped him thrive.

items.name: Jennifer Lee
items.quote: I appreciate the comprehensive care I receive at Aero Prosthetics. From initial consultation to ongoing adjustments, they've been there every step of the way.

services.technologyDescription: At Aero Prosthetics, we leverage the latest technological advancements to provide superior prosthetic and orthotic solutions. Our commitment to innovation means our patients benefit from devices that are more comfortable, functional, and aesthetically pleasing.

journey.title: Your Prosthetic Journey
journey.description: We provide comprehensive support throughout every stage of your prosthetic journey.

step1.title: Initial Consultation
step1.description: Our expert team will conduct a thorough evaluation, discuss your goals, and develop a personalized treatment plan tailored to your specific needs and lifestyle requirements.
step1.point2: Discussion of lifestyle goals and needs

step2.title: Design & Fabrication
step2.description: Using precise measurements and digital scanning, we create a custom socket and select componentry tailored to your unique anatomy and functional requirements.
step2.point3: Test socket fittings for comfort optimization

step3.title: Fitting & Training
step3.description: We meticulously adjust your prosthesis to ensure optimal alignment, comfort, and function. Our rehabilitation specialists work with you to develop confidence in using your new device.
step3.point2: Progressive training program for skill development
step3.point3: Specialized training for your specific activities

step4.title: Ongoing Support
step4.description: Our relationship continues with regular check-ups, adjustments, and support. As your needs change or technology advances, we ensure your prosthetic solution continues to enhance your quality of life.
step4.point3: Access to newest technology and innovations

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services and processes

1.question: What should I expect during my first consultation?
1.answer: During your first consultation, our specialists will evaluate your needs, discuss your goals, and explain the prosthetic options available to you. We'll take measurements and discuss the process of creating your custom prosthetic solution.

2.question: How long does it take to receive a prosthetic?
2.answer: The timeline varies depending on the complexity of your prosthetic needs. Typically, the process takes 2-4 weeks from initial consultation to final fitting, but we prioritize urgent cases and can often expedite the process.

3.question: Does insurance cover prosthetic devices?
3.answer: Most insurance plans, including Medicare and Medicaid, provide some coverage for prosthetic devices. Coverage varies by provider and plan. Our team will help you understand your benefits and assist with insurance authorization.

4.question: How often should I have my prosthetic device serviced?
4.answer: We recommend a maintenance check every 6 months and a comprehensive evaluation annually. Regular maintenance extends the life of your device and ensures optimal function and comfort.
